publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-5293 Cathy Peattie on behalf of the Equal Opportunities Committee: Removing Barriers and Creating Opportunities—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Equal Opportunities Committee’s 2nd Report, 2006 (Session 2): Removing Barriers and Creating Opportunities (SP Paper 677).

S2M-5293 Cathy Peattie on behalf of the Equal Opportunities Committee: Removing Barriers and Creating Opportunities—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Equal Opportunities Committee’s 2nd Report, 2006 (Session 2): Removing Barriers and Creating Opportunities (SP Paper 677).
S2M-5293 Removing Barriers and Creating Opportunities (lodged on 7 December 2006) Margaret Smith*
